headline: Walgreens Boots Alliance, Inc. (WBA)’s Shutting Down A Lot Of Stores, Says Jim Cramer
summary: We recently published 12 Latest Stocks On Jim Cramer’s Radar. Walgreens Boots Alliance, Inc. (NASDAQ:WBA) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed. Walgreens Boots Alliance, Inc. (NASDAQ:WBA) is a pharmaceutical retailer whose shares are up this year primarily due to its acquisition by Sycamore Partners for a $10 billion price tag. The deal […]
